data.title: Noboru Iguchi's "RoboGeisha" comes out on April 7th! CDJapan Articles Archive
data.meta_description: DVD release from the film "RoboGeisha" directed by Noboru Iguchi, visual effects directed by Tsuyoshi Kazuno, and special effects directed by Yoshihiro Nishimura. They are best known for the films "The Machine Girl" and "Tokyo Gore Police." An unattractive girl Yoshie is forced to work like a slave as an assistant for her big sister Kikue, a beautiful geisha. One day, Hikaru Kageno, who is the scion of a steel company, approaches to Kikue in prospect of her high combat capability. And the sisters are abducted by a mysterious organization manipulated by him to be transformed into murderous cyborg assassins. . . Includes a bonus disc.
data.text:
Noboru Iguchi's "RoboGeisha" comes out on April 7th!

"RoboGeisha," the latest Japanese cult film by the director Noboru Iguchi comes out on DVD! Its visual effects are directed by Tsuyoshi Kazuno, and its special effects are directed by Yoshihiro Nishimura. They are best known for the film "The Machine Girl" and "Tokyo Gore Police."

Plot: An unattractive girl Yoshie is forced to work like a slave as an assistant for her big sister Kikue who is a beautiful geisha. One day, Hikaru Kageno, who is the scion of a steel company, approaches to Kikue in prospect of her high combat capability. And the sisters are abducted by a mysterious organization manipulated by him to be transformed into murderous cyborg assassins. . .
